entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chipman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:20 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Doaktown 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: ENE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to rain at times heavy this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Fog patches developing this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 70 this morning then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries and ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18 except minus 23 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18 except minus 23 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
